    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="es">Los ácidos nucleicos</string>
            <string language="en">Nucleic acids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nukleinsäuren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acides nucléiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ácidos nucleic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acidi nucleici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νουκλεϊνικά οξέα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Conjunto de 2 páginas. La primera explica la estructura de los nucleótidos. La segunda trata las estructuras del ADN.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic consisting of two pages, the first explaining the structure of nucleotides and the second explaining the structures of DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Ácidos Nucleicos</string>
            <string language="en">Nucleic acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das aus zwei Seiten bestehen, das erste, 
die Struktur der Nukleotide erklärend und die Sekunde die Strukturen 
von DNA erklärend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet se composant de deux pages, le premier 
expliquant la structure des nucléotides et la seconde expliquant les 
structures de l'ADN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que consistem em duas páginas, o primeiro
explicando a estrutura dos nucleotides e o segundo que explica as 
estruturas do DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che consistono di due pagine, il primo 
spiegando la struttura dei nucleotidi ed il secondo che spiega le 
strutture di DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που αποτελείται από δύο σελίδες, η πρώτη 
εξηγώντας τη δομή των νουκλεοτιδών και τη δεύτερη εξηγώντας τις 
δομές του DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nukleinsäuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
